"Thermos-envy" - Create a new term to describe the feeling of jealousy that comes from seeing others successfully complete tasks using a thermos.
"Thermos-inspired" - Use the thermos as a source of inspiration to complete your own tasks more efficiently.
"Thermos-boost" - Use the thermos as a tool to boost your productivity and motivation to complete tasks more quickly.
"Thermos-mindset" - Develop a mindset similar to the thermos, where you are always ready to tackle any task that comes your way.
"Thermos-" - Use the thermos as a way to break out of your comfort zone and try new things.
